displayProperties.name: 地牢
displayProperties.description: 进入敌人所控制的区域深处进行冒险，充分运用你的光能。

displayProperties.name: 突袭
displayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six god-killers and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: 攻势
displayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six and stave off the onslaught of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: 遗失区域
displayProperties.description:
Advanced scouts have marked sectors of strategic interest ahead of you.

Inspect them for threats and rare equipment.

displayProperties.name: 先锋打击
displayProperties.description: 干先锋队的脏活儿，并使边境得到控制。

displayProperties.name: 日落：严酷考验
displayProperties.description:
The Vanguard authorizes Nightfall strikes to take down the greatest threats faced by the City.

Review Guardian performance and prepare for the next threat.

displayProperties.name: 所有活动
displayProperties.description: 所有活动模式的赛后总结：你所付出的汗水的总和。

Took out Ghaul, woke up the Traveler, and now half of what I hear in the streets is how much you and your clan are making a difference... And that's why I started this whole clan thing in the first place–people are still waiting for the Vanguard to lead the way, but it's time for a change! And Guardians like you are making it happen... No pressure.

displayProperties.name: 熔炉竞技场
displayProperties.description: Did you throw enough grenades?

displayProperties.name: 排位竞技
displayProperties.description: Matches in this playlist affect your Competitive Division placement. Wins will lead to Promotions, increasing your Division placement. Losses will lead to Relegations, lowering your Division placement.
Achieve victory by collecting the Spark and igniting the opponent's Rift.
Hunt hostiles in active warzones. Reckon with greater powers. Be notorious.
Fight for Valor by defeating opponents.
Fight for Valor by capturing zones and defeating opponents.

displayProperties.name: Momentum Control
displayProperties.description: Fight for Valor by capturing zones and defeating opponents. All weapons are more lethal, abilities replenish only on kills, and tracker is disabled.
Achieve victory by controlling zones, earning points for your team over time.
Fight for Valor by eliminating all opponents in this round-based mode. Don't forget to revive your fellow Guardians.
_Your legend, forged in iron. I can think of no better prize for a Lightbearer._
Faster Supers, abilities, and Heavy ammo spawns—withstand and engage in a whirlwind of chaos.
Fight for Valor by defeating opponents. No teams. No allegiance. A free-for-all where the leader had better watch their back.
Fight for Glory by depleting your opponents' shared life pool, then eliminating them.
Compete in a fireteam-required event version of Elimination. Earn as many wins on a ticket as you can. Three losses and you're out.
Achieve victory by defeating opponents and preventing revives. Revive a defeated teammate to steal back the point your opponents scored. Win the most rounds or face off in an elimination showdown.
